entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 p.m. PDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
